__e: The Germans have trapped his men in a pocket and they're squeezing it smaller and smaller.
You go in there... and tell them they're completely surrounded... ..and they must surrender immediately.
He's surrounded. He'll be captured in a few hours.
Kublai was on our land, surrounded by our army, your blade to his throat, and you let him ride away.
We're surrounded by police awaiting my signal.
The Germans showed up. He didn't want to clear off with me.
